data.title: Favorite Demolition Member
data.meta_description: Just because I'm bored and I'd be interested to find out.  Basically I've been watching a lot of late 80s WWF recently and Demolition were massively over So who, for their Demolition work, was y
data.text:
Post by AJ Smudgico on

Just because I'm bored and I'd be interested to find out.

Basically I've been watching a lot of late 80s WWF recently and Demolition were massively over

So who, for their Demolition work, was your favorite member?

Post by DiBiase is Good on

Smash.

Barry Darsow is one of the most under-appreciated workers ever IMO. He was strong, could wrestle and moved pretty well for a big guy. Even with shit gimmicks, he tried his best to make it work because he was so damn good.

Post by mizerable on

Ax just looked cool. Those eyes, man.

Smash was awesome but he didn't legit look psycho.

Crush was just bleh. Much better when he went Kona.

Post by Stone Coke Miami Watson ðŸ¥ƒ on

Ax....most of the time he had a serious look and was more actions than words.

Cool demeanor and fit the gimmick well.

Post by Old Baby on

Smash was easily the best brawler of the two and fit the Demolition mold better than Ax. By the end of Demolition's run, Smash evolved into a much better worker than when he started. I also think Smash was just the better all around performer of the two.

Post by BorneAgain on

#NoDemolitionBlastOptionNoPeace

Seriously though, probably Ax if just because the raspy voice really worked. Darsow was great as Smash but his voice in certain promos came across as unintentionally funny (especially when Smash yelling sounds oddly similar to Curt Hennig yelling).

Post by auph10imitated on

Smash was always my favourite, Barry Darsow obviously. He always looked cooler than Ax. Though Ax was more intimidating. Crush was just there.

Post by celtics543 on

I was pretty young when they were around but I remember always being more of a Smash fan than anything else. Not sure why, could have been because Friendly's had a "Smash" ice cream that I really liked and I just linked the two together but either way he was my favorite.

Post by Futureraven: Beelzebruv on

#NoDemolitionBlastOptionNoPeace

Seriously though, probably Ax if just because the raspy voice really worked. Darsow was great as Smash but his voice in certain promos came across as unintentionally funny (especially when Smash yelling sounds oddly similar to Curt Hennig yelling).

You want funny, just watch him making weird noises and faces whenever anyone else was talking.

Post by Emmet Russell on

Who's Ax?

I always heard "HERE COMES THE ASSSSS! HERE COMES THE SMASHER!!!! THE DEMOLITION!!!"

I thought it was Ass and Smash for the longest time.

Post by Old Baby on

I feel it's worth saying that while not my favorite, I thought Crush was really good. Had the team not already been in decline when they added him, I think he might be remembered much differently. He was a great brawler who was also the most powerful + agile of the three. During their last months feuding with LOD, I remember seeing Smash execute a plancha onto one of the LOD outside. The team could have evolved and just gotten better and better with time if Vince had invested in them instead of Hawk & Animal.
